item.title: KubeRider :: Bundling MacOS release
item.description: In this post, I’ll go through what is involved in building a MacOS release package and publishing it on Github from TravisCI. Step 1: Application Icon Although it is probably quicker to find/generate a logo from an online service. I decided to create a simple logo to go through the process of creating and converting it in vector drawing. Here is what I ended up using the Paper app on iPad.
